description: Dynamics 365 from Microsoft combines CRM, ERP, and productivity apps to streamline sales, marketing, customer service, and operations in one integrated platform

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Creates a new account entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the new account to be created.

revenue.title: Revenue
revenue.description: The revenue associated with the account.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

creditonhold.title: Creditonhold
creditonhold.description: Indicates whether the account is on credit hold.

accountcategorycode.title: Accountcategorycode
accountcategorycode.description: The category code of the account.

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_CASE
tools.description: Creates a new case (incident) entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

title.title: Title
title.description: The subject or title of the case.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of the issue or inquiry.

prioritycode.title: Prioritycode
prioritycode.description: The priority level of the case (e.g., 1 for Low, 2 for Normal, 3 for High).

caseorigincode.title: Caseorigincode
caseorigincode.description: The source of the case (e.g., 1 for Phone Call, 2 for Email).

customerid_account.title: Customerid Account
customerid_account.description: A reference to the related account. Format: '/accounts(GUID)'

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_CONTACT
tools.description: Creates a new contact entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

jobtitle.title: Jobtitle
jobtitle.description: The job title of the contact.

lastname.title: Lastname
lastname.description: The last name of the contact.

firstname.title: Firstname
firstname.description: The first name of the contact.

telephone1.title: Telephone1
telephone1.description: The primary telephone number of the contact.

mobilephone.title: Mobilephone
mobilephone.description: The mobile phone number of the contact.

address1_city.title: Address1 City
address1_city.description: The city of the contact's address.

emailaddress1.title: Emailaddress1
emailaddress1.description: The primary email address of the contact.

address1_country.title: Address1 Country
address1_country.description: The country of the contact's address.

address1_postalcode.title: Address1 Postalcode
address1_postalcode.description: The postal code of the contact's address.

address1_stateorprovince.title: Address1 Stateorprovince
address1_stateorprovince.description: The state or province of the contact's address.

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_INVOICE
tools.description: Creates a new invoice entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name or number of the invoice.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: A reference to the related account. Format: '/accounts(GUID)'

currency_id.title: Currency Id
currency_id.description: A reference to the currency for the transaction. Format: '/transactioncurrencies(GUID)'

price_level_id.title: Price Level Id
price_level_id.description: A reference to the price list. Format: '/pricelevels(GUID)'

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_LEAD
tools.description: Creates a new lead entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: A brief description or title for the lead.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

lastname.title: Lastname
lastname.description: The last name of the lead.

firstname.title: Firstname
firstname.description: The first name of the lead.

telephone1.title: Telephone1
telephone1.description: The primary telephone number of the lead.

companyname.title: Companyname
companyname.description: The company name associated with the lead.

emailaddress1.title: Emailaddress1
emailaddress1.description: The primary email address of the lead.

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_OPPORTUNITY
tools.description: Creates a new opportunity entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name or title of the opportunity.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the opportunity.

estimatedvalue.title: Estimatedvalue
estimatedvalue.description: The anticipated revenue from the opportunity.

customer_account.title: Customer Account
customer_account.description: A reference to the related account. Format: '/accounts(GUID)'

estimatedclosedate.title: Estimatedclosedate
estimatedclosedate.description: The expected close date of the opportunity in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_CREATE_SALES_ORDER
tools.description: Creates a new sales order entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the sales order.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: A reference to the related account. Format: '/accounts(GUID)'

currency_id.title: Currency Id
currency_id.description: A reference to the currency for the transaction. Format: '/transactioncurrencies(GUID)'

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the sales order.

price_level_id.title: Price Level Id
price_level_id.description: A reference to the price list. Format: '/pricelevels(GUID)'

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to retrieve

lead_id.title: Lead Id
lead_id.description: The ID of the lead to retrieve

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_UPDATE_CASE
tools.description: Updates an existing case (incident) entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

title.title: Title
title.description: The subject or title of the case.

case_id.title: Case Id
case_id.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the case to update.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

statuscode.title: Statuscode
statuscode.description: The current status of the case (e.g., 1 for Active, 2 for In Progress, 3 for Resolved).

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of the issue or inquiry.

prioritycode.title: Prioritycode
prioritycode.description: The priority level of the case (e.g., 1 for High, 2 for Normal, 3 for Low).

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_UPDATE_INVOICE
tools.description: Updates an existing invoice entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The updated name or number of the invoice.

duedate.title: Duedate
duedate.description: The updated due date for the invoice in YYYY-MM-DD format.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the invoice to update.

description.title: Description
examples: This is an updated description for the invoice.
description.description: The updated description of the invoice.

totalamount.title: Totalamount
totalamount.description: The updated total amount for the invoice.

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_UPDATE_LEAD
tools.description: Updates an existing lead entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

lead_id.title: Lead Id
lead_id.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the lead to update.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: A brief description or title for the lead.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

telephone1.title: Telephone1
telephone1.description: Primary phone number of the lead.

companyname.title: Companyname
companyname.description: Name of the company associated with the lead.

emailaddress1.title: Emailaddress1
emailaddress1.description: Primary email address of the lead.

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_UPDATE_OPPORTUNITY
tools.description: Updates an existing opportunity entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name or title of the opportunity.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the opportunity.

estimatedvalue.title: Estimatedvalue
estimatedvalue.description: The anticipated revenue from the opportunity.

opportunity_id.title: Opportunity Id
opportunity_id.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the opportunity to update.

salesstagecode.title: Salesstagecode
salesstagecode.description: The current sales stage (e.g., 1 for Qualify, 2 for Develop, 3 for Propose).

estimatedclosedate.title: Estimatedclosedate
estimatedclosedate.description: The expected close date of the opportunity in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

opportunityratingcode.description: The rating of the opportunity (e.g., 1 for Cold, 2 for Warm, 3 for Hot).

tools.name: DYNAMICS365_DYNAMICSCRM_UPDATE_SALES_ORDER
tools.description: Updates an existing sales order entity record in Dynamics CRM using the Web API.

name.title: Name
name.description: The updated name of the sales order.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The user's ID or 'me' for the authenticated user.

description.title: Description
examples: This is an updated description for the sales order.

freightamount.title: Freightamount
freightamount.description: The updated freight or shipping cost for the order.

salesorder_id.description: The unique identifier (GUID) of the sales order to update.
